links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part Two

wikitext.*:
'''Gereth''' was a [[Gnome]] who helped [[Elwing]] escape the [[Second Kinslaying|ruin of Artanor]] by the [[sons of Fëanor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

He, along with [[Evranin]], Elwing's nurse, also managed to smuggle the [[Nauglafring]] out of Artanor.<ref>{{LT2|IV}}, p. 241</ref>
